original_title: Leslie Nielsen's Bad Golf My Way
overview: Leslie Nielsen and his caddy decide to drive a jerky golf player, Brad, insane by playing a round with him and making up rules, distracting him, and filling him with paranoia.

production_companies.name: The Stupid Little Golf Co. Inc.

tagline: Learn about ticks, mime fields, and ridiculous golf betting with Lesley Nielson!
title: Leslie Nielsen's Bad Golf My Way
